nodes.title: Fangage 2.0 - Your fans, your platform
nodes.author: Janis Mjartans

nodes.excerpt: Speakezee allows you to create and share voice stories that expire every 7 days. Our mission at Speakezee is to give people a fast, fun, and engaging way to share their stories, ideas, and emotions through voice!
nodes.title: Speakezee - Create and share voice stories that expire every 7 days!
nodes.author: Gleb Braverman

nodes.excerpt: Data that you create and is relevant to you is present on various applications like Google Drive or Slack but is inaccessible to public search engines. LetsFind integrates with many such applications to help you find your content quickly from one single page.
nodes.title: LetsFind - Search engine for your personal data
nodes.author: Rohith PR

nodes.excerpt: This is the only free way to search Amazon's Best Sellers. Plus you can add it to your website and earn commissions too.
nodes.title: Search Best Sellers - Search Amazon's most-ordered products
nodes.author: Michael Diaz

nodes.excerpt: LinkBin is an app for iOS, iPadOS and macOS that allows temporary storage of links. Saving links is dead simple and you can automate everything with Apple's Shortcuts app.
nodes.title: LinkBin - Save links for later

nodes.excerpt: Avant.fm provides a customizable, listenable feed of new releases from the best indie record labels, across all genres. Works with your Spotify account.

nodes.excerpt: RecSpot is a social app that makes sharing what you love with your friends easy and fun. RecSpot is a new, go-to destination for exchanging, discovering, and watching your favorite movies and television shows. All recommended by people you know and trust.
nodes.title: RecSpot - Recommendations powered by people you know and trust
nodes.author: Ian OBrien

nodes.excerpt: A Visual Studio Code extension that organizes your React app's components into an interactive tree in the sidebar. It shows parent-child relationships, props, navigates to the file where a component is defined, and marks any nodes connected to the Redux store.
nodes.title: Sapling - A convenient way to traverse your React app
nodes.author: Lindsay Baird

nodes.excerpt: What if...? We have unlimited cloud storage for our files and documents. This is the open-source project to give you what you deserve. Using the Telegram API as your unlimited storage. So, you can upload as many as you want without any limit ğŸ‘Œ

nodes.title: The 2021 State of Digital Nomads - The biggest study on location independent remote workers

nodes.excerpt: Kaleidoscope is the perfect productivity enhancement for anyone working with lots of files, such as software developers of any kind. Spot the differences in text and image files, or even folders full of files. Review changes in seconds.
